title: FireDAOJackie_Z
author: FireDAOJackie_Z
content: According to the whitepaper Decentralized Society: Finding Web3â€™s Soul, a fully decentralized society will be governed by its users and Soulbound tokens(SBTs) can function as credentials we use in daily life. This envisions a great society based on a complete functional system of/and values. Our project FireDAO endeavors to contribute to this decentralized society and is building this up step by step. What is your opinion on this ? Please let me know. By the way, I am with the FireDAO team, in charge of the global community. Please contact me should you have any questions.
